about_the_game:
· Hardcore first-person fantasy dungeon adventure game
Escape from the unpredictable dungeons, or head deeper to discover miracles and treasures...
The dead who came back from the dead only wanted to drag you down,
Do adventurers from other players have the same purpose as the dead?
Pray, or good fortune and miracles will not favor you,
Upon death, all your belongings are buried in the dungeon...
Keep going with your team, the legendary treasure is right in front of you.

· Exclusive to your character
Match your stats, talents, skills, armor, and weapons,
You want to be a berserker with strength, or an assassin with speed? Or the highest spellcaster in the realm of magic...
If you're a little more exotic, a fierce mage can also be refreshing.
You are the protagonist of the game, and only you can determine your own play style.

· A freely traded market
Don't want to sell off your in-game items and equipment to a merchant?
Want to buy more sophisticated equipment only to find that the equipment and items sold by merchants are never as good as the equipment dropped by monsters and treasure chests?
No problem, our black market and exchange will make buying and selling a better experience for you.

short_description: Forgotten Lands is a first-person PVPVE dungeon adventure game. Go to the dungeon to fight various monsters to obtain treasure. As the darkness engulfs, a more terrifying existence is about to descend, and perhaps you can find here a treasure that countless people dream of only existing in legend.
